description.value: You repel filth and corruption by your very presence. With a touch of your horn, you may attempt to remove a disease from the target with a counteract check. If the target is not diseased, you may instead cast soothe as a 2nd level heightened spell. Once you have used this feature, you cannot do so again until after you have finished a long rest.

source.value: If you have a spell slot higher than second level through occult spellcasting, you can use a higher level spell slot to further heighten this soothe.
